## Augury_Chapter_04
[OpenFarFarRight][LoadFace_Eirika]
Hmm, it seems like a powerful axe[N]
wielder is on the move.[A][N]
He seems single-minded in[N]
his mission.[A][N]
Is there anyone he knows[N]
within your group?[A][N]
There may be some benefit in letting[N]
him see how much they've grown.[A][X]
